title: "I paid $80 to see Dyrus feed"
body: Best sign I've seen during the entire tournament, gj to the guy who made it.

replies.body: Meh, bunch of ignorant people thinkin that dyrus can 1v3 under turret.

> [{quoted}](name=Kat for Elo,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=2okqmLEd,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-05-10T05:59:03.404+0000)
>
> Meh, bunch of ignorant people thinkin that dyrus can 1v3 under turret.

Thankyou.

> [{quoted}](name=Kat for Elo,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=2okqmLEd,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-05-10T05:59:03.404+0000)
>
> Meh, bunch of ignorant people thinkin that dyrus can 1v3 under turret.

I felt bad for him, honestly and the fact that his team didn't even try to help him just made me so mad.

well, that's their main team strategy, let them squash Dyrus while Bjerg and Turtle get fed. The only issue was that neither of them were playing well enough to capitalize on the attention Dyrus was drawing, leaving Dyrus to look like a feeder for no reason at all.
Rest of TSM had no pressure or lane presence, their jungler off eating cookies. Wth were the team even doing?
I agree but it is still a funny sign
Still hilarious though.
Koro can do it, Huni can do it, it just show that dyrus is mediocre at best.
I paid nothing... Well worth the money :)
...well if this "guy" was thinking TSM had a chance:  He is a fool and deserved the loss.

Agree 100%. They looked like complete clowns. Not even on the same level as any of the other teams except maybe that team from Turkey.

If we're going to have a team that demonstrates an embarrassing level of play, that feeds 3 kills before 4 minutes-- can we just replace this team with a bunch of really attractive people of both genders, actually born in the US, who sort of know how to play? Because then we could have a cool US team just by being completely different. As it is, we're not even doing that.
I looked at the SKTSM stream while playing an aram. Dyrus picked a carry top laner(Irelia I believe). I laughed and then stopped watching.

> [{quoted}](name=FluxBound,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=2okqmLEd,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2015-05-10T05:49:12.058+0000)
>
> I looked at the SKTSM stream while playing an aram. Dyrus picked a carry top laner(Irelia I believe). I laughed and then stopped watching.

He played Sion and got tower dived 1v3

> [{quoted}](name=Aniplex Exp,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=2okqmLEd,comment-id=0001000100000000,timestamp=2015-05-10T11:26:38.859+0000)
>
> He played Sion and got tower dived 1v3

Except for the sion part, thats literally every TSM game in that tournament LOL
Including the Sion part, thats about every other game TSM plays, only usually Dyrus feeding doesnt matter

> [{quoted}](name=FluxBound,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=2okqmLEd,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2015-05-10T05:49:12.058+0000)
>
> I looked at the SKTSM stream while playing an aram. Dyrus picked a carry top laner(Irelia I believe). I laughed and then stopped watching.
down voted because you said sktsm
Your dumbassery is spreading lol
Isn't this every TSM game since forever?  Dyrus gets left alone up top, gets dove by 2-4 people while they gank for mid (regi/bjerg).  Dyrus's motto is feed to win, duh.
TSM should never lane swap then, because they can at least dragon off of his deaths if he's always top.
Dyrus didn't feed, noobs. He tower hugged and got dived 1v3. Thats NOT feeding.

Watch again ... they didn't really dive him untill after he pushed up like a noob and got ganked twice near the enemy tower.

It was very selfish, prob because he didn't agree with the team strat.  

If he'd stop feeding in standard lanes, TSM's other lanes are pretty good.  I thought Dyrus' s showing was a replaceable offense.

So you think they wouldn't have tower dove him if he made the lane freeze right in front of his tower?  I don't think so.  That would have made it even easier for them to tower dive him and kill him for first blood.  It's pretty obvious every single team was gunning on Dyrus before the matches even started.  Just listen to the casters.  Watch that one TSM Legends episode.  He never had a chance.

> [{quoted}](name=Simeji,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=2okqmLEd,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-05-10T11:24:31.998+0000)
>
> Dyrus didn't feed, noobs. He tower hugged and got dived 1v3. Thats NOT feeding.

It's actually feeding even more, think about all that extra assist gold.

> [{quoted}](name=Shroominator,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=2okqmLEd,comment-id=00050002,timestamp=2016-01-09T14:28:57.664+0000)
>
> It's actually feeding even more, think about all that extra assist gold.

Nope!~ Tower hug is a tower hug.
3v1 isn't feeding. He didn't go IN and give them a kill, he went in and tower hugged got minions and walked away from them under the tower.
If you think its "Feeding" then {{item:3070}}  Too bad for you
Don't forget "Deficio is a vampire".

Wow. There's a limit to how much someone can dic ride.
If you look at the game properly he got dived under turret over 2 times and always by three people. Not only that santori. Did sht the whole time, and bjerg was doin wht he normally does farm so that he can carry but since no one (santorin) was getting him rolling he couldn't do what he had to do which is carry. And u can't carry if the lowest level on the opposite team is ad strong as you. So if you wanna blame anybody blame Santorin  cause if I was him instead of doin nothing I woulda camped top lane.
Not Dyrus's fault he gets camped every single game and the rest of the team just derp around like soloq

> [{quoted}](name=MCBiggah99,realm=EUW,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=2okqmLEd,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-05-10T01:51:00.313+0000)
>
> Best sign I've seen during the entire tournament, gj to the guy who made it.

http://i.imgur.com/Roh9e58.jpg
dyrus carry the match in tsm vs gv {{champion:2}} {{champion:2}} {{champion:2}} {{champion:150}}
God I feel bad for Dyrus
I feel like every game dyrus gets camped lol.
He pushed up 3 times and gave up first blood.  It's like he was trying to make some sort of bronze level solo queue point.  Dyrus is a very selfish player. On a scale of 1 to Huni, Dyrus is a 0.

Imagine if Dyrus was replaced by Quas.

Just think about it.

While Dyrus is not the strongest top laner MSI was tsm failing as whole, he was literally thrown to the sharks while the rest of tsm watched  from a boat. You cant just give up a lane like that and get nothing out of it, other 4 needed to do something.
Not to be the a hole here but at certain parts of the game he did overextend multiple times knowing the circumstances
That was so priceless, anyone have a screenshot ?
Best sign NA
I once saw a guy who held up a copy of a DVD of "The Last Airbender" (m night shamalamadingdong's) behind the casters with one hand and then flipped it off with the other.
I'm still surprised people watch anything besides worlds still.
